newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Bulgaria places two issues 9-day discount T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Bulgaria places two issues 9-day discount T-bills.

text.p: Bulgaria's Finance Ministry placed 17.11 billion levs worth of nine-day discount T-bills, yielding 4.06 percent until maturity, the Bulgarian National Bank (BNB) said.
In line with its usual practice the BNB did not say with which financial institution or institutions the issues were placed on Wednesday.
Details of the issues follow. Prices are in percent of par:
Par value 11.181 bln levs 5.932 bln levs
